Privacy Policy for Azkar Fold

Last updated: December 2024

Our Commitment to Privacy

At Azkar Fold, we deeply respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how our app handles your data and what measures we take to ensure your spiritual practice remains private and secure.

Data Collection

🔒 We do not collect any personal data

Azkar Fold does not collect, store, or transmit any personal information from your device. Your privacy is paramount to us, and we believe your spiritual practice should remain completely private.

Local Data Storage

All your data in Azkar Fold is stored locally on your device, including:

  • Your custom azkar creations
  • Prayer count progress
  • App settings and preferences
  • Usage statistics (stored locally only)

This information never leaves your device and is not accessible to us or any third parties.

Third-Party Services

📱 No analytics or tracking

Azkar Fold does not use any third-party analytics, tracking tools, or advertising services. We believe your spiritual journey should be free from external monitoring or data collection.

App Store Compliance

Azkar Fold fully complies with Apple's App Store privacy guidelines and requirements. Our app's privacy practices are transparent and designed with user privacy as the top priority.

Data Security

Since all data remains on your device, your information is protected by your device's built-in security features, including:

  • iOS/iPadOS system-level encryption
  • Your device's passcode and biometric protection
  • Secure local storage mechanisms

Children's Privacy

Azkar Fold is safe for users of all ages. Since we don't collect any personal information, there are no privacy concerns related to children's data under COPPA or similar regulations.

Changes to This Policy

If we ever update this Privacy Policy, we will notify users through the app and update the "Last updated" date above. However, our core commitment to not collecting personal data will remain unchanged.

Contact Us

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us through our Contact Us page.

🛡️
Privacy First

Your spiritual practice, your privacy, our promise.
